mapper.insert: insert into sys_reply (id, sys_feedback_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, reply) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysFeedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{reply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_reply set sys_feedback_id = #{sysFeedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, reply = #{reply,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, sys_feedback_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, reply from sys_reply where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
